name: Omar
message: I’d like to be 20 again… Can you make that happen...? If not, I can settle on access to your forecasting tool as you always seem to know what everyone wants and you’re never out of stock!

name: Lola
message: I’ve not written my letter to you yet!

name: Luis
message: ALL I want for Christmas are treats!

name: Carmen
message: I’ve not written my letter to you yet!

name: Marian
message: I’ve not written my letter to you yet!

name: Stella
message: I’ve not written my letter to you yet!

name: Joel
message: I’ve not written my letter to you yet!

name: Erika
message: I have been very good this year!! As you know I love Christmas and my wish list is Christmas decorations, candles, chocolates, sweets or whatever you think I deserve!!!

name: Kate
message: For Christmas this year I like presents like: Wine, Candles, Chocolates, Helpful gadgets for the kitchen, Books. Wishing you a very merry Christmas!

name: Isabelle
message: You can never go wrong with a little something Japanese!

name: Nia
message: As you know, because you are real, I have been enjoying a lot of herbal teas recently…there’s nothing that I would love more than a very large mug to enjoy my tea from! Thank you for making all my tea drinking dreams come true Santa! You’re the best!
